    var len;

    num = pos = 0;
    if (!substr.length) {
      return 1 / 0;
    }
    while (pos = 1 + string.indexOf(substr, pos)) {
      num++;
    }
    return num;
  };

      }
    }
    return flattened;
  };

  exports.del = function(obj, key) {
    var val;
    val = obj[key];
    delete obj[key];
    return val;
  };

    return array[array.length - (back || 0) - 1];
